Name: Encounter: Jazzmondius
Description:
Before the game begins, put Jazzmondius onto the field.
Before each night, if Jazzmondius is in the discard pile, shuffle him into the encounter deck.

Name: Jazzmondius
Description:
This enemy does not attack during the attack step. This effect can't be blanked.
After you play an action that damages this enemy, it attacks.

Name: Fill With Despair
Description:
Jazzmondius attacks X times, where X is half the number of cards on your partner's field, rounded up.
Discard each hero card on your field.

Name: Shadowjazz
Description:
This enemy does not attack during the attack step. This effect can't be blanked.
Effects that cause Jazzmondius to attack also cause this enemy to attack.

Name: Growing Storm
Description:
As time passes, discard a hero card from your hand.

Name: Dasher of Hopes
Description: Each day, you can play actions or resources from your partner's field, but not both.

Name: Lifegrasp
Description:
Jazzmondius attacks.
Discard a hero card from your hand.

Name: Hawk Lord's Servant
Description: As time passes, discard a hero card from your hand.
